title: Whatever happened to Nexus Blitz?
body: Announcement for Team Fight Tactic got me thinking - whatever happened to nexus blitz? The game mode was fast paced and fun, so for the most part I really thought it would be a stapled addition to the game. It had been months since it was taken out and now a new, permanent game mode is added in its stead?

replies.body: not "canceled" just put into rotation due to player drop off

> [{quoted}](name=MordridtheBlack,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NOEYM47y,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-06-22T10:27:27.226+0000)
>
> not "canceled" just put into rotation due to player drop off

The plan to make it a permanent mode was canceled. What with the rarity of RGMs, I'm not sure if we'll be seeing it too often.

I doubt TFT will be a perm game mode, even with it being stupidly popular on the PBE

they'll have some quests centered around it, people will do those and then likely only touch it when they want to play league but not play league

NB was fun, but the issue was that, once everyone did the quests, the game mode dropped in popularity, because no one had a real reason to play it

the same will likely happen to TFT
